DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of Next Generation Ophthalmic Irrigating Solution (NGOIS) compared to BSS PLUS for use during surgery for removal of epimacular membrane and vitrectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Next Generation Ophthalmic Irrigating Solution Posterior Segment Study
DOC.criteria: Patients of any race and sex, with an epimacular membrane who would benefit from vitrectomy and membrane removal. Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply. Under 18 years of age. Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply.
